patrons.name: Charlie Mackin
patrons.dialogText: Your support means the world to me!

patrons.name: Harry
patrons.dialogText: Music fills every corner of this space. I compose soundtracks for indie games. Thank you for believing in creative work!

patrons.name: Kevin
patrons.dialogText: Research never stops! I'm studying the intersection of AI and creativity. Your patronage helps fund important research!
